title: * Description is updated.
message: * Description is updated.

title: * Version number is shown in About box.
message:
* Version number is shown in About box.
* Description is directed toward "you" instead of "me".
* Description includes reference to 'pomodoro' and 'timeboxing'.

title: * Readme is updated.
message: * Readme is updated.

title: * Readme.md file matches app description.
message: * Readme.md file matches app description.

title: * Project path is changed, so load can happen directly from sln file.
message:
* Project path is changed, so load can happen directly from sln file.
* App logo exists.
* The "TurnScreenOff" and "TurnScreenOn" actions no longer exist. (the turn-screen-off action required the change-device-settings permission, which is too dangerous-looking)
* New actions exist: ResumeSession (forgot this one earlier)
* App is submitted to Google Play Store! (not yet sure if accepted)

title: * Graph bottom-bar is resized so that the rows exactly fit into the visible…
message:
* Graph bottom-bar is resized so that the rows exactly fit into the visible area. (i.e. can't see part of other rows above or below)
* Graph bottom-bar has a background set, so that see-through to stuff in the rows-panel doesn't happen (which shouldn't actually be happening in the first place).
* Line doesn't: show up sometimes in a gap-label (semi-transparent) background.

title: * Freeze doesn't occur sometimes when stopping a paused session.
message:
* Freeze doesn't occur sometimes when stopping a paused session.
* When error occurs, error file name is incremented properly.

title: * Work sessions don't extend into next row incorrectly, when session stopped in…
message: * Work sessions don't extend into next row incorrectly, when session stopped in next-utc-day, but before next visual-day/row.

title: * New action-bar button exists: export graph
message: * New action-bar button exists: export graph

title: * A gap segment is shown for a row's final (empty) stretch.
message:
* A gap segment is shown for a row's final (empty) stretch.
* A segment label's text is shrunk to fit, if too big to do so normally.
* You can see older days by scrolling up on the graph.

title: * New hotkeys setting exists: key hold length
message: * New hotkeys setting exists: key hold length

title: * Session types are editable. (e.g. you can add your own, remove the default Rest and Work types)
message:
* Session types are editable. (e.g. you can add your own, remove the default Rest and Work types)
* Session started in prior row does not cause current row to show a negative-length segment label.
* Clicking directly on a checkbox in the settings panel correctly toggles its state (rather than doing nothing, because of double-toggling).

title: Mid-way backup. Size issue resolved; now need to finish the changes started.…
message: Mid-way backup. Size issue resolved; now need to finish the changes started. (e.g. editable session-types)

title: * A session successfully shows on graph, even if: it's the first of the row, and…
message: * A session successfully shows on graph, even if: it's the first of the row, and still running. (used to be filtered out, because the time-stopped wasn't "in range" of row--I had forgotten to include handling of case where it was null/still-running)

title: * Alarm sound does not: continue playing, even after activity is destroyed. (in…
message:
* Alarm sound does not: continue playing, even after activity is destroyed. (in case where bluetooth controller is connected/disconnected)
* Otherwise-uncaught errors are now caught and logged to file. ("[app root]/Errors/[date-time].txt")

title: * New setting exists: start graph at local hour X
message:
* New setting exists: start graph at local hour X
* When a <1min segment separates two others, those two others don't end up overlapping each other. (all segments now have views created, even if <1min (maybe temp))

title: * New setting exists: "set master alarm volume to X, before sounding alarm"
message: * New setting exists: "set master alarm volume to X, before sounding alarm"

title: * Segments have labels at the bottom showing their lengths.
message:
* Segments have labels at the bottom showing their lengths.
* Increased visibility of hour-markers. (slightly)

Make-so:
* Segments don't overlap sometimes, as with no-activity segments on tablet.
* Event system exists. (e.g. for marking lucid dreams)

title: * Productivity graph works!
message:
* Productivity graph works!
* New settings exist: show local time, show 12-hour time

title: * Productivity graph has the day rows showing.
message:
* Productivity graph has the day rows showing.

Make-so:
* The day-rows show the correct content!

title: * Port of PercentSupportLibrary added to project. (some code was modified to not…
message:
* Port of PercentSupportLibrary added to project. (some code was modified to not need the ViewCompat and MarginLayoutParamsCompat libraries; also, haven't yet made-so all its code is in C# style)
* More resource files are replaced with simpler/better-integrated code versions. (e.g. for the settings page's row separators/borders)
* Subsession system exists. (having data added on pauses and resumes)

Make-so:
* Productivity graph gets displayed.

title: * New setting exists: block unused keys
message:
* New setting exists: block unused keys
* Mouse-input-blocker tool available in menu. (letting user keep bluetooth controller from being able to click the Stop button)

Make-so:
* Screen-turn-off function works reliably. (didn't seem to work in last attempt/test)
* Session time-pauses are recorded.
* Productivity graph is displayed.

title: * New actions exist: PauseSession, ToggleSessionPaused, StopSession,…
message:
* New actions exist: PauseSession, ToggleSessionPaused, StopSession, TurnScreenOff, TurnScreenOn, ToggleScreenOn
* Sessions are recorded and saved to file. (though not yet displayed on graph; also, time-pauses are not yet recorded)
* New "(Show recent keys)" button exists in Settings menu showing key-code for recently pressed keys.
* A hotkey can use any key now. (lets you choose any from the Keycode enum)

Make-so:
* Time-pauses are recorded.
* Day/session data is displayed on productivity graph.

title: * "Days visible at once" setting is visible in the settings menu.
message:
* "Days visible at once" setting is visible in the settings menu.
* That timers slow down during sleep mode is correctly handled. (process-time method no longer cares when/how-often/how-frequently it's called)
* Notification is not updated when timer is paused.

title: * Added separators to settings menu.
message: * Added separators to settings menu.

title: * Screen turns on when timer goes off.
message: * Screen turns on when timer goes off.

title: * Alarm media-player runs on the Alarm stream. (rather than the media stream)
message:
* Alarm media-player runs on the Alarm stream. (rather than the media stream)
* Notification says if timer is paused.
* Notification is removed if timer is stopped.

title: * Notification system exists!
message:
* Notification system exists!

First version that I think I'll start actually using.

title: * Audio now plays when the timer times-out!
message:
* Audio now plays when the timer times-out!

Make-so:
* Timer runs in background. (and possibly shows time-left as notification)

title: * Locking the countdown-label button works.
message: * Locking the countdown-label button works.

title: * Dynamic UI gets cleared when pressing the stop button.
message:
* Dynamic UI gets cleared when pressing the stop button.
* RefreshDynamicUI does what it's supposed to.

Make-so:
* Locking the countdown-label button works.
* Dragging the countdown-label button works.

title: * New setting exists: Keep screen on while open
message:
* New setting exists: Keep screen on while open
* Most of the timer system works.

Make-so:
* Dynamic UI gets cleared when pressing the stop button.
* RefreshDynamicUI does what it's supposed to.
* Countdown lock system (on the time-left/time-over label/button) works.

title: * Hotkey-system is added!
message: * Hotkey-system is added!

title: * Timer step buttons are now generated based on these new settings: number of…
message:
* Timer step buttons are now generated based on these new settings: number of timer steps, time interval for timer steps

Make-so:
* Timer start, pause, and stop functionalities work.

title: * About menu works.
message: * About menu works.

title: * Settings menu is done for now.
message: * Settings menu is done for now.

title: * File chooser is operational!
message:
* File chooser is operational!

Make-so:
* Program data (including alarm sound path) is saved to VDF file.

message:
* File chooser system is added. (converted from Java to C#)

Make-so:
* File chooser is utilized to select the alarm-sound.

title: * Settings menu looks okay, for now.
message:
* Settings menu looks okay, for now.
* VDF system is added. (though not yet in use)

Make-so:
* File chooser system is added and operational.

title: * New controls exist: sound-icon button
message:
* New controls exist: sound-icon button

Make-so:
* Time labels exist.

title: * These elements exist: timer-start buttons, time-left bar, time-over bar, stop…
message:
* These elements exist: timer-start buttons, time-left bar, time-over bar, stop button, and pause button

Make-so:
